content: रागिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [राग-इनि] {@--1@} Coloured, dyed. {@--2@} Colouring, painting. {@--3@} Red. {@--4@} Full of passion or feeling, impassioned. {@--5@} Full of love, subject to love. {@--6@} Passionately fond of, devotedly attached to, desirous of, yearning after (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>). {@--7@} Delighting, rejoicing. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A painter. {@--2@} A lover; एको रागिषु राजते प्रियतमादेहार्धहारी हरः <ls>Bh. 3. 121.</ls> {@--3@} A libertine, sensualist. --णी {@--1@} A modification of a musical mode (राग), of which 30 or 36 kinds are enumerated. {@--2@} A wanton and intriguing woman, a lustful woman.
